The Beanpot is an annual hockey tournament between Northeastern University Boston University Boston College and Harvard University PERIOD The tournament sells out every year as schools compete for bragging rights across town PERIOD Both men and womens hockey compete each year PERIOD

Every mens championship to date has featured either BC or BU while Northeastern and Harvard have historically performed best in the womens Beanpot PERIOD Each year the tournament is hosted at TD Garden PERIOD

Northeastern has won the mens Beanpot four times the last in  and womens  times the last in  PERIOD

Photo courtesy Lauren Siegert PERIOD

The independent student newspaper of Northeastern University
